content.query:
create DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_ds
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

drop EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_format

drop EXTERNAL table population


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_format_normal
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS
    (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR='\t',
        ENCODING = 'UTF8',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
        
    )
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_format
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS
    (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR='\t',
        ENCODING = 'UTF8',
        PARSER_VERSION='1.0'
        
    ),
    DATA_COMPRESSION='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'
)

drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_ds

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_ds
WITH(
    LOCATION='wasbs://population@covid24reportsa.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL=cred_ds
)

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_ds1
WITH(
    LOCATION='https://covid24reportsa.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL=cred_ds
)

use mydb

select * from population

create EXTERNAL TABLE population
(
    field1 VARCHAR(50),
    field2 VARCHAR(50),
    field3 VARCHAR(50),
    field4 VARCHAR(50),
    field5 VARCHAR(50),
    field6 VARCHAR(50),
    field7 VARCHAR(50),
    field8 VARCHAR(50),
    field9 VARCHAR(50),
    field10 VARCHAR(50),
    field11 VARCHAR(50),
    field12 VARCHAR(50),
    field13 VARCHAR(50),
    field14 VARCHAR(50)
) 
WITH
(
    LOCATION='population_by_age.tsv.gz',
    DATA_SOURCE=ext_ds,
    FILE_FORMAT=tsv_format
    --FIRST_ROW = 2 
)

select * from population
where field2<>'2008'


create external table population_output3
(
    field1 varchar(50),
    field2 varchar(50)
)
with (
    LOCATION='population/population.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=ext_ds,
    FILE_FORMAT=tsv_format_normal
)
AS 
SELECT field1, field2 FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'population_by_age.tsv.gz',
    DATA_SOURCE='ext_ds',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='\t',
    DATA_COMPRESSION='GZIP',
    PARSER_VERSION='1.0',
    FIRSTROW=2
)
WITH(
    field1 VARCHAR(50),
    field2 VARCHAR(50),
    field3 VARCHAR(50),
    field4 VARCHAR(50),
    field5 VARCHAR(50),
    field6 VARCHAR(50),
    field7 VARCHAR(50),
    field8 VARCHAR(50),
    field9 VARCHAR(50),
    field10 VARCHAR(50),
    field11 VARCHAR(50),
    field12 VARCHAR(50),
    field13 VARCHAR(50),
    field14 VARCHAR(50)
    ) as result;
